name: Beeing The Best
description:
This game is centered around the topic wildlife pollinators. The game takes place in the year 2080  where all the pollinators have gone extinct, all except for the few bees that are left. With the extinction of bees comes a gloomy and polluted ecosystem. It’s up to you as one of the only existing bees to help pollinate the remaining glowing flowers. Pollinate one flower each round to help revive our clean and flourishing environment.

Team

Storyline Editors - Ria Persaud and Kajol Kundra
